about.title: About Us
about.story_p1: Obsidian Intelligence was born from a simple question: What if life wasn't limited to carbon-based forms? We are a team of engineers and designers from the fields of robotics, AI, and precision manufacturing.
about.story_p2: We don’t believe in brute force computing; we believe in elegant solutions. In a world full of noise, we are dedicated to creating silent, powerful, and invisible intelligence cores that drive the industrial heart of the future.
about.address:
Block A, Obsidian Innovation Center
No. 1 Zhongguancun Street, Haidian District, Beijing

o1.desc: Core of Edge Computing. 200 TOPS, Zero Latency.

hero.headline: Full Access. Down to the Metal.
hero.subtext: We don’t believe in black boxes. With Obsidian SDK, you access every computing core of the NPU directly. No sugar-coated wrappers, just pure performance.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.text: Clear, no nonsense. Our docs are maintained by core architects to ensure every parameter definition is accurate.

sdk.title: SDK
sdk.multilang: Native C++ performance, Python ease-of-use, Rust safety.
sdk.simulator: Validate everything in a digital twin before flashing code to the chip.

community.text: Join the Obsidian Developer Forum. No support agents here, only direct dialogue between engineers.

cta.title: Direct Memory Access
cta.desc: Control the O-1 chip with zero-overhead bindings.

toast.title: Reflex SDK 2.0 is currently in closed beta.

hero.headline: Do the Hard Things.
hero.subtext: Obsidian is not for everyone. If you are satisfied with copy-pasting code, this is not for you. If you are excited about squeezing the last bit of performance from hardware, if you want to watch your code drive robotic arms to lift heavy weights—welcome home.

perception.title: Perception Architect
perception.desc: Extreme optimization of Visual SLAM algorithms.

kernel.title: Kernel Engineer
kernel.desc: Dive into Reflex OS internals, manage millisecond-level interrupt responses.

designer.title: Industrial Designer
designer.desc: Sketching the future industrial form with minimalist lines.

topic1.title: General Embodied Model
topic1.desc: Robots knowing how to grasp objects they've never seen. We are training the next generation of physical world large models.

topic2.title: Neural Rendering & Sim
topic2.desc: Making the virtual world in the robot's eye indistinguishable from reality.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Data Gravity Principle
privacy.text: Obsidian's Privacy Promise: Data Gravity Principle. We believe data has gravity; it should stay on the device that generated it. All inference, learning, and storage on the Obsidian O-1 chip happen locally. No bytes leave your hardware unless explicitly authorized and physically exported. We do not collect, upload, or training cloud models with your data.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.text: Obsidian is committed to providing industrial-grade stability. Use of this product for development violating international humanitarian law or autonomous weapon systems is strictly prohibited.

meta.version: Terms of Service v1.0 • Enforcement Date:

flow.title: Reflex OS
flow.subtitle: Integration is Flow.
flow.description: The real-time operating system designed for embodied intelligence. It's not just code; it's the machine's nervous system. From visual perception to motor control, data streams with zero-copy inside the kernel. Making every robot movement as natural as biological instinct.

hero.title: Invisible Intelligence.
hero.subtitle: Real technology is as precise as gravity. Invisible, silent, omnipresent.
hero.description: We don’t build robot shells. Whether it's the steel joints of a robotic arm or the chassis of an autonomous vehicle, that's just the body. Obsidian builds the ‘Heart’ that understands the physical world—the compute power silently flowing beneath aluminum armor, and the decisions made in microseconds. We believe ultimate intelligence shouldn't be flaunted; it should dissolve into every perfect grasp on the production line, silent yet powerful.

card1.title: Physics First
card1.description: Code cannot defy gravity. Our algorithms never deviate from physical reality. Before writing the first line of code, we calculate friction, inertia, and thermodynamic boundaries. Make software surrender to physics, not fight it.

card2.title: Silent Data
card2.description: Data is an asset, not a commodity. The O-1 chip uses a localized inference architecture. Images captured by cameras, vibrations recorded by sensors—everything is computed at the edge. No cloud upload, no privacy leaks. Your data belongs only to your device.

card3.title: Built to Last
card3.description: Industrial sites don't accept 'Beta versions'. Our hardware and software standards are born for 50,000 hours of continuous operation. We don't chase trends; we chase the extreme certainty of 'zero downtime'.

hero.subtitle: The Ultimate Form of Edge Computing

material.title:
Armored Body,
Carrying Intelligence.
material.subtitle: Armored Intelligence.
material.p1: Forged from 6000-series aerospace-grade aluminum, CNC machined from a single block via 5-axis milling.
material.p2: This is not just a shell; it is the passive cooling armor for the entire computing unit.
material.highlight: No fans. No noise. Only cold metal and pure performance.

thermal.title: Cool.
thermal.subtitle: Stay Cool.
thermal.desc:
Designed for harsh industrial environments from -20°C to 60°C.
Remains calm and restrained even at full computing power.

hero.title: Reflex OS
hero.subtitle: Giving intuition to the steel body. The real-time operating system built for embodied intelligence.

interface.title: What You See Is What You Get.
interface.subtitle: Real-time visual debugging terminal.

kernel.title: 0.5ms Ultra-low Latency Kernel
kernel.desc: Say goodbye to jitter. Reflex OS bypasses the traditional Linux scheduling layer to communicate directly with the O-1 chip.

sim.title: Sim-to-Real
sim.desc: Crash 1000 times in the virtual world, just for perfect avoidance in reality.

code.title:
Code,
Never So Elegant.
code.desc: Python API designed for robotics, reducing complex motion control from hundreds of lines to just a few.

hero.title: Answers to the Physical World.
hero.subtitle: From micron-level assembly lines to autonomous mines. When the cloud cannot reach, Obsidian takes over.

automotive.title: Neural Assembly
automotive.challenge: Flexible material assembly is notorious for robots. Traditional automation fails when the material bends unpredictably.
automotive.solution: Robotic arms equipped with O-1 cores use Reflex OS 'Real-time Force Control'. Instead of rigidly following paths, it 'feels' the resistance like human fingers, micro-adjusting posture by 0.02mm.

medical.title: Zero Latency
medical.challenge: In telesurgery, a 200ms network lag can be fatal. Cloud processing is not an option.
medical.solution: Obsidian's edge computing locks visual processing and force feedback locally. Hand tremors are filtered, while tissue haptics are transmitted back in <1ms.

mining.title: Off-Grid Autonomy
mining.challenge: 500 meters underground. No GPS. No 5G. High dust, high vibration.
mining.solution: LiDAR-based pure local SLAM navigation. Truck swarms communicate via Mesh networks in total darkness, operating continuously for 30 days without signal.

logistics.title: Swarm Intelligence
logistics.challenge: Scheduling 500+ AGVs usually requires a massive central server. If the server halts, the warehouse stops.
logistics.solution: Decentralized architecture. Each AGV is a compute node. They negotiate right-of-way automatically, avoiding like a school of fish. No center, no single point of failure.

hero.subtitle: Obsidian O-1 Neural Compute Platform. Letting intelligence leave the cloud and return to atoms.

gap.text: In the micro-precision of industrial operations, waiting is a risk. Obsidian O-1 eliminates transmission latency by injecting supercomputing power directly into every robotic joint.

software.title: Reflex OS. The IDE mastering the physical world.
software.subtitle: Real-time OS designed for embodied intelligence. Simplifying complex physical laws into elegant code.

fusion.title: Hardware-Software Fusion.
fusion.desc: Hardware defines the boundary. Software breaks it.

privacy.title: Data Gravity Principle.
privacy.desc: Local inference. Your data never leaves your factory.

efficiency.title: Calm Performance Beast.
efficiency.desc: 200 TOPS of surging power. Unibody CNC vapor chamber armor. Stays calm even at the limit.

impact.title: Empowering "Zero-Error" Scenarios.
impact.text: From minimally invasive surgery to unmanned mining 1000m underground. Obsidian is redefining the baseline of industry.

hero.title: Calm as Obsidian.
hero.subtitle: Calm as Obsidian.
hero.text: In this noisy AI era, we choose calm. We don't chase the language bubbles of generative AI; we focus on the certainty of the physical world. Obsidian Intelligence: building the backbone of machines.

origin.title: The Weight of a Name.
origin.p1: was born from the rapid cooling of volcanic lava. Hard, sharp, it was one of humanity's earliest tools.
origin.p2: We named ourselves this because with the O-1 chip, we are doing the same:
origin.p2_quote: Cooling the scorching, chaotic Data Magma at the edge, condensing it into hard, sharp action commands.
origin.p3: From chaos to order. From magma to blade. This is Obsidian.
origin.caption: FIG. 01 — TRANSITION_STATE

vision.title: Invisible Intelligence.
vision.subtitle: Invisible Intelligence.
vision.p1: Real technology should be like gravity—omnipresent, yet invisible.
vision.p2: Our vision is to let intelligence "descend" from cloud data centers into robot joints, car chassis, and camera retinas. When you don't feel its existence, but just feel the machine becoming handy, dexterous, and understanding, our work is done.

01.title: Local First
01.desc: Compute at the edge. Intelligence at the edge. Never rely on unstable networks.

02.title: Heavy Duty
02.desc: We are not born for demos. We are born for 24/7 industrial sites.

03.title: Silence
03.desc: Talk less, do more. Let lines of code and runtime efficiency speak.

team.title: The Builders.
team.subtitle: The Builders.
team.text: We are a group of algorithm engineers, chip architects, and hardcore geeks. We once changed the world through code in Silicon Valley giants; now, we return to the physical world, trying to move atoms with code.

footer.quote: The stone age didn't end because we ran out of stones. It ended because we found something sharper.
footer.author: — OBSIDIAN INTELLIGENCE.

calibrationPage.body: The area you are accessing (Docs / API / Lab) is undergoing final security audit before launch. To ensure industrial-grade stability, we refuse to release half-finished products. Estimated opening: Q3 2026.
